trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Minneapolis
There were no other sightings in Minneapolis on or around March 27th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my backyard feeding my dogs and facing downtown minneapolis I looked up because I always watch the airplanes,this time i noticed that there were alot of them flying at the same time and then i noticed what looked like three airplanes flying in a line but the one in the middle did not have a red light comming from it there were just white lights around it. this only happens at night and goes on all the time. I don't want to sound crazy but i know i have the blueprints for a teardrop shape transportation device that runs off salt water. on october 13, 2005 In cedar rapids Iowa saw a bright blue light in the sky in noticed that it started to blink vanish and move in Zig zag formation and zip off leaving behind a blueish green streak of light that slowly faded away. In the name of the lord i will not lie to the people.
Summary: airplanes flying around somthing that looked strange
